UKHSA 鼓励符合条件的少数族裔群体预订流感和 COVID-19 疫苗UKHSA 强烈鼓励符合条件的少数族裔群体，特别是来自巴基斯坦和加勒比黑人族裔群体以及生活在较贫困地区的个人，预订流感和 COVID-19 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/UKHSA-encourages-eligible-people-from-ethnic-minority-groups-to-book-their-flu-and-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/UKHSA-encourages-eligible-people-from-ethnic-minority-groups-to-book-their-flu-and-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed5dfdf8-ac9a-475b-b57d-85f189c452cf Fri, 08 Dec 2023 08:41:10 -0500 UKHSA encourages eligible people from ethnic minority groups to book their flu and COVID-19 vaccines

冷冻电镜显示 TAF15 是额颞叶痴呆的潜在治疗靶点包括印第安纳大学医学院专家在内的一个国际研究小组在额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 患者大脑中发现了一种蛋白质，为该疾病的潜在治疗方法找到了新靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Cryo-EM-reveals-TAF15-as-potential-treatment-target-for-frontotemporal-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Cryo-EM-reveals-TAF15-as-pottial-treatment-target-for-frontotemporal-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78ba5945-4093-4ff4-9f81-e4257efd74f5 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 23:54:00 -0500 Cryo-EM reveals TAF15 as potential treatment target for frontotemporal dementia
